headline.main: Some Help Getting Reimbursed for OTC Drugs

docs.abstract: A Web site offers some help with flexible spending account reimbursements for over-the-counter drugs.
docs.snippet: A Web site offers some help with flexible spending account reimbursements for over-the-counter drugs.

docs.lead_paragraph: New I.R.S. rules that went into effect this year, as part of the Affordable Care Act, made it harder for consumers to have non-prescription medicines reimbursed from health-care flexible spending accounts.

headline.main: Some Help Getting Reimbursed for OTC Drugs

docs.abstract: A Web site offers some help with flexible spending account reimbursements for over-the-counter drugs.
docs.snippet: A Web site offers some help with flexible spending account reimbursements for over-the-counter drugs.

headline.main: The Depreciation of Care at Home

docs.abstract: People who provide care to their own families and others deserve better protections from the government, an economist writes.
docs.snippet: People who provide care to their own families and others deserve better protections from the government, an economist writes.

docs.lead_paragraph: Nancy Folbre is an economics professor at the University of Massachusetts, Amherst.

docs.lead_paragraph: At a memorial service for her brother, Mona Simpson recalled his love of beauty and his family, and his final moments.

docs.lead_paragraph: While the world watched the demise of Qaddafi, some unsettling news from Wall Street helped explain why all those protests are resonating.

headline.seo: Did You Hear the One About the Bankers?
headline.main: Did You Hear the One About the Bankers?
headline.print_headline: Did You Hear the One About the Bankers?

docs.abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column argues that the American financial industry has grown so large and rich that it has corrupted the country's real institutions through political donations; asserts that capitalism and free markets are the best engines of generating growth and relieving poverty only if they are balanced with meaningful transparency, regulation and oversight.
docs.snippet: While the world watched the demise of Qaddafi, some unsettling news from Wall Street helped explain why all those protests are resonating.

docs.lead_paragraph: A renegade cartoonist discovers her inner creativity guru.

headline.seo: Cartoonist Lynda Barry Will Make You Believe In Yourself
headline.main: Lynda Barry Will Make You Believe In Yourself
headline.print_headline: The Lynda Barry School for Drawing Spirals, Confronting Demons, Learning to Sing, Being Terrified and Maybe Becominga Capital-W Writer

docs.abstract: Dan Kois article profiles Lynda Barry, who has transitioned from a career as a popular alt-weekly cartoonist to teaching writing workshops for non-writers.
docs.snippet: A renegade cartoonist discovers her inner creativity guru.

docs.lead_paragraph: The case for vaccinating boys, as well as girls, against a sexually transmitted virus associated with several cancers is getting stronger.

headline.seo: The HPV Vaccine Is for Their Own Good

docs.abstract: Editorial calls on public health officials to focus on increasing vaccination rates for all preteens against the human papillomavirus; holds that evidence of the vaccination's effectiveness in preventing a range of adult-onset cancers is compelling.
docs.snippet: The case for vaccinating boys, as well as girls, against a sexually transmitted virus associated with several cancers is getting stronger.
